title: kailAsanAtham bhajEham
sahitya:
kailAsanAtham bhajEham kAmAdi vrttim tyajEham


anupallavi

 shaila rAjAtmajApatim pashupatim shankaram bhakta vashankaram


caraNam   vAlakhilyAdi pUjita gAtram vasuprada nipuNatara kSEtram 
kAla kAma haraNa caraNa nEtram kamalEshAdi sannuti pAtram 
nIlakaNTha guruguha putram nityAnanadam parama pavitram 
shUlapANi matyadbhuta citram svaprakAsha jitavahni shashi mitram
